about_the_game:
• Online Multiplayer: Compete and collaborate with players from around the world. Do you have what it takes to be the king of the wheelie?

• Amazing Tricks: Perfect your skills and perform the most impressive wheelies. Show your skill and earn extra points for your unique style!

• Maps: Explore the maps, Drive, Wheelie and avoid losing your Maneuver with obstacles, Explore and find the best route to show your perfect Record.

• Customization: Upgrade and customize your Motorcycle and Character to stand out from the crowd. The more you play, the more you unlock!


• Competitive Rankings: Get on the podium with our daily, weekly and monthly rankings. Compete against the best and show your name at the top of the leaderboards!

• Daily Challenges: Take part in exciting daily challenges to earn rewards and improve your ranking.

• Special Events: Join special events with unique game modes and exclusive prizes.

Are you ready to become a wheelie legend? Race ON RUBBER and prove that you are the best on the asphalt!
detailed_description:
• Online Multiplayer: Compete and collaborate with players from around the world. Do you have what it takes to be the king of the wheelie?

• Amazing Tricks: Perfect your skills and perform the most impressive wheelies. Show your skill and earn extra points for your unique style!

• Maps: Explore the maps, Drive, Wheelie and avoid losing your Maneuver with obstacles, Explore and find the best route to show your perfect Record.

• Customization: Upgrade and customize your Motorcycle and Character to stand out from the crowd. The more you play, the more you unlock!


• Competitive Rankings: Get on the podium with our daily, weekly and monthly rankings. Compete against the best and show your name at the top of the leaderboards!

• Daily Challenges: Take part in exciting daily challenges to earn rewards and improve your ranking.

• Special Events: Join special events with unique game modes and exclusive prizes.

Are you ready to become a wheelie legend? Race ON RUBBER and prove that you are the best on the asphalt!

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: OSX 10.14+
  • Processor: 2.0 Ghz
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: OSX 10.14+
  • Processor: 2.0 Ghz
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Storage: 4 GB available space

name: In A Wheel

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows XP
  • Processor: 2.2Ghz or faster Dual Core
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 256GB Dedicated VRAM
  • DirectX: Version 5.2
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: 2.2Ghz or faster Dual Core
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 1GB Dedicated VRAM
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

short_description: Are you ready to become a wheelie legend? Race ON RUBBER and prove that you are the best on the asphalt!
supported_languages: English, French, Spanish - Spain, Spanish - Latin America
